q1: Who's the best player in Manchester United
a1: Paul Pogba is the best player
a2: I think the best player is Romelu lukaku
a3: Romelu Lukaku's goals record is better than Cristiano Ronaldo's and Lionel Messi's, so praise Jose Mourinho for his ridiculously good form

a4: Manchester United is currently ranked 7 in the Premier League.

a5: With their latest wins, I think the certainly have a chance to rank higher.
